advancements.dimensional.materials.title: Dimensional Materials!
advancements.dimensional.pockets.title: Pockets!
advancements.dimensional.pockets.desc: Craft a Pocket for the first time.
advancements.dimensional.nether_star.des: Split a nether star into shards.
advancements.dimensional.ingot.title: Gearing Up!
cosmosportals.gui.config.name: Cosmos Portals Config
cosmosportals.gui.config.size_info: Allows you to change the maximum size of Portals
cosmosportals.gui.config.size_info_two: WARNING: Larger portals WILL create lag
cosmosportals.gui.config.size_info_three: Limited to the range of between 2 and 9
cosmosportals.gui.config.sound.travel_in: Whether this mod will play Portal Travel Sounds
cosmosportals.gui.config.sound.ambient_i: Whether this mod will play Ambient Portal Sounds
cosmosportals.gui.config.message.info_de: Whether this mod will print [INFO] messages to the console/log
cosmosportals.gui.config.message.debug_d: Whether this mod will print [DEBUG] messages to the console/log
cosmosportals.gui.config.frame_textures_: Whether or not Portal Frames use Connected Textures
cosmosportals.gui.config.portal_textures: Whether or not Portals use Connected Textures
cosmosportals.gui.config.labels_info: Whether or not Portal Labels are rendered
cosmosportals.gui.config.particles_info: Whether or not Portal Particle Effects are rendered
cosmosportals.gui.config.message.restart: A restart is required for this option to take effect
cosmosportals.gui.dock.label_info: Show or Hide Portal Dimension Labels.
cosmosportals.gui.dock.entity_info: Allow all Entities to pass, or only Players.
cosmosportals.item_info.container: An item that stores a Positon and Dimension to be used in a Portal.
cosmosportals.item_info.container_one: This item will store your Position and the Dimension you are in when used.
cosmosportals.item_info.container_three: To use: Shift-right-click on a Portal Dock.
cosmosportals.item_warning.container_sto: This container already has a Recorded Dimension! Shift-right-click to overwrite.
cosmosportals.block_info.dock_one: Portal Controller. Used to summon a Portal.
cosmosportals.block_info.dock_two: To use: Shift-right-click an activated Dimension Container.
cosmosportals.block_info.dock_three: Has a GUI, can be configured.
